issue.title: [CF 762] Unit ID condition
issue.body:
We're soon going up against the Throne of Thunder boss Primordius. From what I understand he spawns adds that are virtually identical save for their unit ID. Could you make it possible to check units for a specific ID via a condition?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #762 | Raw

comments.body:
By unit ID, do you mean their NPC ID? That's the ID that it in the URL when you view the page for an NPC on Wowhead. Unit ID refers specifically to the in-game identifier like "player" or "target".


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm referring to the NPC ID.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Added in r723


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
